title: kAmAkSi varalakSmi
sahitya:
kAmAkSi varalakSmi kamalAkSi jayalakSmi shrI


anupallavi

 kAma janaka pUrNaphalE sakalE kAmitArtha dAyini shrI phalE 
kamakalE vimalE kara kamakalE kAmakOTi bilaharinuta kamalE


caraNam   dinakara kOTi prakAsha kAyE dEdIpyamAna divyacchAyE 
vanajAsanAdi vandita mAyE vAsudEva parabrahma jAyE 
manana dhyAna dhyAtr-dhyEyE mahanIya sAmrAjya pradAyE 
sanaka sanandanAdi hir-jnEyE sadayE sarasa guruguha sah
